files.README.md:
# Sedona Plugin Marketplace

A [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code) plugin marketplace. Research tools, productivity extensions, and AI-augmented workflows.

## Setup Guide

### Step 1: Install Claude Code

If you don't have Claude Code yet, install it:

```bash
npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code
```

### Step 2: Add the marketplace

Open Claude Code and run:

```
/plugin marketplace add https://github.com/codyrobertson/claude-plugin-marketplace.git
```

> **Note:** Use the HTTPS URL above. SSH URLs (`git@github.com:...`) require SSH key configuration and will fail with "could not read from remote repository" if you don't have keys set up.

### Step 3: Install a plugin

```
/plugin install gemini-research@sedona-plugins
```

### Step 4: Restart Claude Code

Restart your Claude Code session for the plugin to take effect.

---

## Available Plugins

| Plugin | Category | Description |
|--------|----------|-------------|
| gemini-research | Research | Multi-agent research pipeline with Gemini CLI + Exa + Obsidian |
| company-research | Research | Company intel using Exa search (competitors, news, financials) |
| feature-orchestrator | Development | Multi-agent feature development lifecycle orchestration |
| interviewer | Workflow | Structured requirements gathering with interview templates |
| sprint-tasks | Project Management | Agile task management with kanban board and status tracking |
| sprint-cycle | Development | Complete sprint lifecycle with quality gates and retrospectives |

---

### gemini-research

Multi-agent research pipeline using Gemini CLI + Exa + Obsidian.

- Two-wave iterative research with gap analysis between waves
- Fans out parallel Gemini CLI agents (one per subtopic)
- Source verification with confidence ratings
- Saves rich reports to Obsidian with frontmatter, callouts, and tables

**Install:**
```
/plugin install gemini-research@sedona-plugins
```

**Prerequisites:**

1. **Gemini CLI** (required)
   ```bash
   npm install -g @google/gemini-cli
   ```

2. **Gemini API key** (required)
   Get one at https://aistudio.google.com/apikey, then add to your shell profile:
   ```bash
   echo 'export GEMINI_API_KEY="your-key-here"' >> ~/.zshrc
   source ~/.zshrc
   ```

3. **Obsidian MCP** (for saving reports to Obsidian)
   ```bash
   claude mcp add obsidian -- npx @mauricio.wolff/mcp-obsidian@latest "/path/to/your/vault"
   ```

4. **Exa MCP** (for structured web search)
   ```bash
   claude mcp add --transport http exa "https://mcp.exa.ai/mcp?tools=web_search_advanced_exa"
   ```

---

### company-research

Company research using Exa search. Finds company info, competitors, news, tweets, financials, and LinkedIn profiles.

**Install:**
```
/plugin install company-research@sedona-plugins
```

**Prerequisites:** Exa MCP (see above)

**Usage:** "Research company Stripe" or "Find competitors to Vercel"

---

### feature-orchestrator

Orchestrates complete feature development through 6 phases: Discovery, Codebase Exploration, Architecture Design, Implementation, Quality Review, and Retrospective. Coordinates specialized agents in parallel.

**Install:**
```
/plugin install feature-orchestrator@sedona-plugins
```

**Usage:** "Build feature user authentication" or "Orchestrate development of the payment flow"

---

### interviewer

Structured interview system for requirements gathering. Includes templates for feature discovery, API design, database schema, UI components, and technical decisions. Auto-triggers when requirements are ambiguous.

**Install:**
```
/plugin install interviewer@sedona-plugins
```

**Usage:** Triggers automatically when requirements are unclear, or invoke directly with "Interview me about the new dashboard feature"

---

### sprint-tasks

Agile sprint task management from the CLI. Create, update, complete, and visualize tasks with ASCII kanban board, priority levels, and status tracking.

**Install:**
```
/plugin install sprint-tasks@sedona-plugins
```

**Usage:**
- `/sprint-tasks board` - View kanban board
- `/sprint-tasks create --title="Build landing page" --priority=high`
- `/sprint-tasks complete --id=task-001`

---

### sprint-cycle

Complete sprint lifecycle coordinator. Runs planning, implementation, quality gates (tests, lint, typecheck), code review (brutal-code-critic + production-code-validator), and retrospective phases.

**Install:**
```
/plugin install sprint-cycle@sedona-plugins
```

**Usage:** `/sprint Build the user dashboard feature`

---

## Updating

To pull the latest plugins and versions:

```
/plugin marketplace update
```

## Adding Plugins

To add a new plugin to this marketplace:

1. Create your plugin repo with a `.claude-plugin/plugin.json` manifest
2. Add an entry to `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json` in this repo
3. Open a PR

## Troubleshooting

**"Could not read from remote repository"**
Use the HTTPS URL, not SSH:
```
/plugin marketplace add https://github.com/codyrobertson/claude-plugin-marketplace.git
```

**Plugin not showing up after install**
Restart Claude Code. Plugins are loaded at startup.

**Gemini CLI not working**
Run `gemini` once interactively to authenticate, or verify your API key:
```bash
echo $GEMINI_API_KEY
echo "test" | gemini
```

## License

MIT
